lead_paragraph: ROSEN--Annette. March 21, 1925 - July 22, 2016. A life-long New Yorker, Annette was active in many civic organizations, most fondly, the Women's City Club of New York. Annette was the daughter of Samuel and Molly (Weisbrod) Young. Annette is survived by Richard, her beloved husband of almost 60 years; her sons Michael (Susan) and Andrew (Brandi Beck); and grandchildren, Matthew, Sam and Charlie Rosen and Dasha Fowler. She was preceded in death by her brother, Paul, and her beloved granddaughter Elizabeth Hannah Rosen. A memorial service is being planned. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made in Annette's memory to the Alzheimer's Foundation of America. 1/3
